medical_history.chief_complaint: Collapse during a team bus journey leading to resuscitation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient collapsed in the team bus; subsequent symptoms and conditions evaluated through cardiac examination, including electrophysiological study causing ventricular fibrillation.
medical_history.family_history: Father underwent cardiac examinations revealing similar findings without clinical symptoms.
medical_history.social_history: Professional athlete; details beyond occupation not specified.
